original_text: He did not say this because he really wanted to help the poor people. No, he said it because he wanted the money himself. He kept the bag of money and sometimes he took money from it for himself.
korean_text: 이렇게 말함은 가난한 자들을 생각함이 아니요 그는 도둑이라 돈궤를 맡고 거기 넣는 것을 훔쳐 감이러라

sentences.original_text: because he really wanted to help the poor people
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 정말로 가난한 사람들을 돕고 싶어해서가 아니라

sentences.original_text: because he wanted the money himself
He kept the bag of money
and sometimes he took money from it for himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 때때로 그는 그것에서 자신을 위해 돈을 가져갔다
